Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory78.jpg'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You have almost walked around the entire town, but it looks just as peaceful.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Speaking of which, Kamui, are you familiar with this movie? Anything worth noting?', 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Not really... If a movie is always so peaceful, I'll get bored really soon... Wait, what's that?", 5: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui is pointing to a footprint trail that leads to the north of the town.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Feels like we are those typical bold young people in horror movies... Hey, wait for me!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: "A white rocky ground in the dark forest catches everyone's eye."}
{3: 'The moonlight only makes it more disturbingly bright.'}
{3: 'There is a group of people in the center of the rocky ground. Tom and the grocery shop owner are there too.'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "F'fhalma... Geb! Geb!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tom', 3: "F'gnaiih... Geb! Geb!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Everyone', 3: 'hai!hai!hupadgh hai!'}
{2: 'Everyone', 3: 'hai!hai!hupadgh hai!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...What are they doing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Whatever they are doing, it doesn't look good.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I think I have seen similar things in the database...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh! Wanshi told me about this movie!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'It was about a group of people trying to summon something horrible... Something like that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But I watched it for twenty minutes and it was all peaceful daily life of the town. So I turned it off.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Screw it. It's just a summon ritual, right? Let's just smash everything!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui picks up his greatsword and charges out again.'}
